name: Shadow Fear Path to Insanity
description:
You are Nathan, an journalist that cover mysterious unresolved cases.
In the middle of the night you receive a call from your niece saying that her mom ( your sister )
as been gone to Lencour Mountain the day before and she never returned. In panic you take your bag, your camera
and go take your niece to a relative. An endless night is about to get down. Your goal is to find your sister and survive the night...

This game is a FPS survival horror in the style of Resident Evil, Silent Hill and Outlast.
You can defend yourself in this game don't be afraid.

In this game you will have to deal with first of all : survival.
Enemy's all deal different amount of damage, but you are limited too the damage dealed by
your equipped weapon. But you have always an 1 on 3 chance to evade any attack.
To progress in the game you will have to solve puzzles and find the appropriated items.
At the end of the game you will receive a note "score", so try to use as less healing items as possible.

If you want to invert the Y axis of the mouse you can download Sakasa Mouse it is a free software! ( Thanks to Audish )
